data.title: The Last Column
data.meta_description: Marie Colvin. Samir Kassir. James Foley. Shujaat Bukhari. These are just a few of the more than 1,300 journalists who have been killed in the line ...
data.text: Marie Colvin. Samir Kassir. James Foley. Shujaat Bukhari. These are just a few of the more than 1,300 journalists who have been killed in the line of duty. To honor their memories, we gathered a selection of their last works to share them widely with the world. Introducing The Last Column , a way to remember those who gave their lives to uncover the truth, and a demand justice so that those responsible for the murders are held accountable. Created in partnership with the Committee to Protect Journalists.
